description: If your lookin to make some good baselines, have a go at this.

I've waited a couple of years to find such a superb drum machine. Over the last months I've been recording with Hydrogen, great drumkit sounds. My musician friends are completely "flabergasted" by the quality of my drum recordings. So easy to use, intuitiv and responsive.However hhe ladspa plugins stopped working.
summary: Excellent software, beginners and pro's should try this... Just Great!

description: this is so good i absolutely love it omg
summary: OMG SUPER GOOD APP! MUST DOWNLOAD

description: Keine Ahnung was das sein soll.
Hab's aus versehen installiert. Scheint zu machen, was es soll, aber lässt sich nicht entfernen…
Funktioniert wie es soll. Klare Empfehlung.
summary: Super Möglichkeiten und schnell zu verstehen

description: esta muy buena, ademas puedo usar mis propios sonidos
